item.title: Close the Now Playing widget in KDE4
item.description: I’ve lost a good 5 minutes trying to close the damn Now Playing Widget in KDE 4 You’ll be happy to know that even with “widgets unlocked” the damn X button only works if amarok (or probably another player) is running Is it me or is this plain wrong ?
